mapper.select: SELECT a.*, au.creat_dt FROM (SELECT a.author_code, r.role_code, r.role_nm, r.role_ty, r.role_sort, r.role_dc FROM altservice.COMTNAUTHORINFO a, altservice.comtnroleinfo r WHERE a.author_code = #{author_code}) a LEFT JOIN altservice.comtnauthorrolerelate au ON a.author_code = au.author_code
